content: your heel flap measures 5cm/2in twistedstitch bigcartel com designed by twisted stitch © 2023 @_twistedstitch pattern intended for personal use only gusset toe round 1 - pick up and knit 12 round 1 - *k1 ssk k to 3 sts stitches along the side of the before marker k2tog k1* twice heel flap until you reach the decreased 4 instep stitches you put away earlier pm round 2 - k all k across instep pm repeat rounds 1 and 2 until you have 20 sts remaining pick up and knit 12 stitches on the other side of the heel flap arrange the sts evenly over 2 needles and bind off with the round 2 - k all stitches kitchener stitch round 3 - k across the heel to 3 sts before marker k2tog k1 sm k across instep sts to the next marker k1 ssk k to end of round 2 sts decreased repeat rounds 2 and 3 until you have returned to the number of stitches you cast on 44sts foot work in stockinette sts until the sock measures 4cm/1 5in less than your total foot length for example if your foot is 25cm long start on the toe when the sock measures 21cm from the back of the heel to your live stitches twistedstitch bigcartel com designed by twisted stitch © 2023 @_twistedstitch pattern intended for personal use only
